organization.description: This group gathers datasets of relevance to educational applications. it includes data about open educational resources (OER) and items which were created with an explicit educational purpose, as well as otherwise relevant datasets (academic publications, video assets, etc). All datasets included should expose linked data, and provide at least a SPARQL endpoint. For any enquiries, please contact the administrators via data@linkededucation.org.
organization.title: Linked Education Cloud
organization.name: linked-education

name: open-data-tor-vergata
notes:
Open Data @ Tor Vergata is a project developed in collaboration with the Tor Vergata University Computing and Documentation Centre (CCD) and Etcware srl, on a 2007-2013 POR FESR (Regional Operational Programme, European Fund for Regional Development) grant funded by Filas for the Latium region.

The goal of the project is to publish the administrative and teaching-related data of the University as open data. In addition, Etcware srl has developed Android and iOS applications for accessing teaching data primarily.
title: Open Data @ Tor Vergata
